description: a(n)=Sum_{d|n} d*psi(d), where psi(d) is reduced totient function, cf. A002322.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
prog: (Haskell)a061258 n = sum $ zipWith (*) ds $ map a002322 ds            where ds = a027750_row n-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Sep 02 2014
author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, Apr 21 2001
